channel.title: Problems with logging in my own server
channel.description: I am currently having problems with logging into my own server. Every time I click login immediately "Error Connecting to server" Appears. I don't know what has happened, but I used to be able to login to my server. Please can someone explain how to get past this. If it helps I am using Utorrent to host the server as this is easier than Port-forwarding.

item.title: Problems with logging in my own server
item.dc:creator: @2h_slapped 2h slapped
item.description:
@2h_slapped wrote:

[quote=“Toasty411, post:7, topic:241658”]You gotta set your ip to 127.0.0.1 and have your server running noobs.[/quote]false…

item.title: Problems with logging in my own server
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

Toasty411:

You gotta set your ip to 127.0.0.1 and have your server running noobs.

127.0.0.1 is default localhost IP address.
So is 0.0.0.0, so it would log you in. Please learn a little and concentrate on some things around the forum before making stupid remarks like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with logging in my own server
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

well u set ur varibles???

Learn what you’re talking about before you post. Also you need to go back to English class and learn grammar.
[hr]

You gotta set your ip to 127.0.0.1 and have your server running noobs.
You don't know what you're talking about either. He got an error while running the server on the cmd,so obviously he has his ip set "smart one."

item.description:
@ash_2oo8 wrote:

joeyman178:

well i am using Richscape client, but anyother client has the same problem :S also any other one of my servers i try to run have the same problem- i cant login :S[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2008, 11:01:30 am[/size][hr]I have also just updated my version of Java and I still can’t connect to my server or to 0.0.0.0 when I run it. Please can someone help me, I will even make you admin on my server if you can solve this problem!

well u set ur varibles???
